name: Thin Ice [working title]
description:
Thin Ice is a tactical deck builder where Buck the hero Puffin must destroy the evil Oil Drill that is greedily causing the melting of Buck's home.  

Players will control Buck in a tile-based grid by playing cards.  Cards will be consist of two parts, one is movement and the other is buffs or debuffs for armor or attack.  And each card part will come from a different deck- that way the cards will change every time the player shuffles their two decks.

The scope is still TBD and will depend on how technically difficult it is to create a tactical grid system and deck/hand management in Unity.
